uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.chebi

Class ChebiConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.chebi.ChebiConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChebiConfigMBean

    public class ChebiConfig
extends Object
implements ChebiConfigMBean
    Implementation of ChebiConfigMBean. It can be configured from a properties file (readFromFile(), readFromFile(String) or at runtime via JMX. For the available properties see readFromInputStream(InputStream)
    Author:
    rafa

      • readFromFile

        public static ChebiConfig readFromFile()
                                throws IOException
        Reads the configuration for the ChEBI proxy from a properties file chebi-adapter.properties in the classpath.
        Returns:
        a configuration for the ChEBI proxy with the properties values from the file, or the default ones for those missing.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of problems reading from file.
        Since:
        1.0.4
        See Also:
        Properties' keys.

      • readFromFile

        public static ChebiConfig readFromFile(String filePath)
                                throws IOException
        Reads the configuration from a file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to a file with the configuration properties. Searched first in the classpath, then if not found in the current working directory.
        Returns:
        a configuration for the ChEBI proxy with the properties values from the file, or the default ones for those missing.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of problems reading from file.
        Since:
        1.0.4
        See Also:
        Properties' keys.

      • readFromInputStream

        protected static ChebiConfig readFromInputStream(InputStream is)
                                          throws IOException
        Reads the configuration from an input stream. The properties' keys are:
        • ep.chebi.threads.max: (integer) maximum number of threads started to retrieve data from the web service.
        • ep.chebi.search.max: (integer) maximum number of compounds retrieved from the web service.
        • ep.chebi.search.stars: (string) curation status of results retrieved from ChEBI (see StarsCategory enum).
        • ep.chebi.ws.timeout: (integer) maximum time (ms) to get a response from the web service.
        • ep.chebi.compound.base.url: (string) base URL for ChEBI compounds (complete URL is built by appending the ChEBI ID at the end).
        • ep.chebi.compound.img.base.url: (string) base URL for compound images (complete URL is built by appending the ChEBI ID at the end).
        • ep.chebi.ws.test.url: (string) URL for ChEBI web services for testing, which accept a chebiId parameter instead of a whole SOAP request.
        • ep.chebi.ss.url: the URL for the chebi structure search.
        • ep.chebi.ss.results.url: (string) URL to retrieve structure search results for some given parameters (probably stored previously).
        • ep.chebi.ss.printerfriendly: (boolean) is the web interface of the structure search printer friendly (i.e. without headers, ready to embed in another web page)? Normally set to true.
        • ep.chebi.ss.special.dataset: (string) the configuration of the structure search at the ChEBI side. Normally set to EnzymePortal.
        • ep.chebi.ss.data.source: (string) the source of cross references in ChEBI for which results will be filtered. Normally set to EnzymePortal.
        • ep.chebi.ss.callback.url: (string) the URL called from a result from the ChEBI structure search. It includes an asterisk which will be replaced by the ChEBI ID.
        Parameters:
        is - an input stream.
        Returns:
        a configuration for the ChEBI proxy with the properties values from the file, or the default ones for those missing.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of problem reading the properties from file.
        Since:
        1.0.4
